parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance that is deployed in the classic network. You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~25506~~) operation to query available instances.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPC for which the ClassicLink feature is enabled. You can call the [DescribeVpcs](~~35739~~) operation to query available VPCs.
